00005 """A clone of the default copy.deepcopy that doesn't handle cyclic
00006 structures or complex types except for dicts and lists. This is
00007 because gyp copies so large structure that small copy overhead ends up
00008 taking seconds in a project the size of Chromium."""
00009 
00010 class Error(Exception):
00011   pass
00012 
00013 __all__ = ["Error", "deepcopy"]
00014 
00015 def deepcopy(x):
00016   """Deep copy operation on gyp objects such as strings, ints, dicts
00017   and lists. More than twice as fast as copy.deepcopy but much less
00018   generic."""
00019 
00020   try:
00021     return _deepcopy_dispatch[type(x)](x)
00022   except KeyError:
00023     raise Error('Unsupported type %s for deepcopy. Use copy.deepcopy ' +
00024                 'or expand simple_copy support.' % type(x))
00025 
00026 _deepcopy_dispatch = d = {}
00027 
00028 def _deepcopy_atomic(x):
00029   return x
00030 
00031 for x in (type(None), int, long, float,
00032           bool, str, unicode, type):
00033   d[x] = _deepcopy_atomic
00034 
00035 def _deepcopy_list(x):
00036   return [deepcopy(a) for a in x]
00037 d[list] = _deepcopy_list
00038 
00039 def _deepcopy_dict(x):
00040   y = {}
00041   for key, value in x.iteritems():
00042     y[deepcopy(key)] = deepcopy(value)
00043   return y
00044 d[dict] = _deepcopy_dict
00045 
00046 del d
